title: How to Stay Safe and Healthy During a Heat Wave
headline: This free online health and safety course teaches you how to keep yourself and your loved ones safe during a heat wave.
description: The recent global trend of increased heat waves may have caused you some anxiety about extreme weather conditions. This health and safety course addresses such concerns and explains the science, effects and significance of the health threats posed by high temperatures. We teach you how to manage resources to stay hydrated and explain how to prevent complications and maintain thermal comfort at home or the workplace during heat waves.

courseDescription:
Enduring and surviving very uncomfortable heat waves may present a challenge as extreme temperatures can cause a variety of heat-related ailments and even death. The first section of this course lays out the basics of heat waves and examines the meteorological factors that cause them.

The repercussions of prolonged heat waves on society are significant and include an increase in the number of heat-related deaths. Heat waves are among the most hazardous weather-related natural dangers. Despite this, their death tolls and level of destruction are not usually immediately noticeable and typically do not receive the attention they deserve. This course explains how to prepare for the dangers posed by heat waves to ensure the health and safety of yourself and those around you.

This course provides the information and skills required to handle a heat wave and take the necessary precautions to prevent any fatalities in your home or workplace. Beyond the obvious discomfort, heat waves are a source of stress and present a range of health dangers that can lead to death. Thankfully, there are many ways to maintain health and safety during a heat wave and this course goes through them carefully to help you prepare for the next spike in temperature. This course also suits health and safety officers who want to expand their skills and professional portfolio. Summer is coming so sign up to learn how to beat the heat and protect those around you from rising temperatures.
